name: Resident Evil Code Name Hunk
storyline: Before the end of Umbrella, the alpha team of U.S.S. commanded by Hunk need to collect all the samples created by Dr. Young an ex-umbrella scientist responsible of the creation of the TNB virus, a T-veronica variation. The events occur in a complex facility located in Mero city.
summary: A Resident Evil themed Doom total conversion mod
